item.title: News24 | Republican presidential candidate Nikki Haley targeted in swatting incident
item.description: Authorities responded to a fake emergency at the South Carolina home of Republican presidential candidate Nikki Haley in December after a man claimed to have shot a woman and threatened to harm himself at her home, according to town records.

item.title: News24 | Gunmen in Iran kill nine foreigners near Pakistan border: report
item.description: Gunmen in southeastern Iran near the Pakistan border killed nine foreign nationals Saturday, Iranian media reported, more than a week after the neighbours exchanged deadly cross-border fire.

item.title: News24 | 'Massacres throughout the night': Fighting rages in battleground Gaza city
item.description: Intense fighting raged Saturday in the Gaza city of Khan Yunis, the main theatre of conflict where the Israeli army is targeting the Palestinian Islamist militant group Hamas.

item.title: News24 | Australia, Canada suspend UN agency funding after Israeli allegations
item.description: Australia and Canada have suspended their funding to the UN agency for Palestinian refugees, after Israel accused several employees of involvement in Hamas's October 7 attack.

item.title: News24 | Jury orders Donald Trump to pay $83 million for sex assault defamation
item.description: A jury in New York ordered former US president and 2024 candidate Donald Trump on Friday to pay $83.3 million to compensate the writer E. Jean Carroll whom he was found to have sexually assaulted and defamed.

item.title: News24 | Vince McMahon resigns from WWE parent company TKO after sex assault claim
item.description: WWE co-founder Vince McMahon resigned on Friday from his role as executive chairman of TKO, the parent group of the pro wrestling juggernaut, after a lawsuit accusing him of sexual misconduct.

item.title: News24 | SA vs Israel: Nations call for compliance with ICJ order, focus shifts to Security Council
item.description: A number of countries stressed the need for Israel to abide by the World Court's orders. That will be up to the UN Security Council, where the United States holds a veto.

item.title: News24 | Israel must comply with ICJ ruling even though 'suffering won't end today or tomorrow' â€“ Pandor
item.description: International Relations Minister Naledi Pandor has called on Israel to comply with the International Court of Justice ruling.

item.title: News24 | ICJ finds in favour of SA that Israel is suspected of genocide - but doesn't order ceasefire
item.description: By a strong majority, the International Court of Justice (ICJ) has found South Africa's accusations about Israel's military operation in Gaza have the potential to constitute genocide - but stopped shy of ordering a ceasefire.

item.title: News24 | What South Africa wanted, and what the ICJ actually ordered
item.description: The International Court of Justice (ICJ) on Friday issued an order that differs in ways both major and minor from what South Africa had requested.

item.title: News24 | 'Painless and humane method of execution': Alabama executes killer with nitrogen gas
item.description: Alabama has executed convicted murderer Kenneth Smith, who held his breath in vain as officials asphyxiated him with nitrogen gas, the first use of a new method of capital punishment.

item.title: News24 | 'Truly cruel and inhumane': Japan arsonist who killed 36 appeals death sentence
item.description: A Japanese man sentenced to death for an arson attack that killed 36 people at an anime studio has appealed the ruling, a court has announced.

item.title: News24 | SEE | Princess Charlene celebrates her 46th birthday with family and a seven-tier cake
item.description: Monaco's Princess Charlene celebrated her 46th birthday on Thursday with her husband, Prince Albert and 9-year-old twins Prince Jacques and Princess Gabriella.

item.title: News24 | 'Grossly distorted': Israel faces 1pm Friday deadline for ICJ ruling on Gaza war
item.description: UN judges in The Hague will rule whether to order Israel to suspend its military campaign in Gaza as officials push ahead with efforts to negotiate a new deal for a ceasefire.

item.title: News24 | 'Safety of Ukrainian captured servicemen': Russia, Ukraine trade plane crash blame
item.description: Moscow and Kyiv traded accusations at the UN Security Council after the crash of a Russian military plane near the Ukraine border.

item.title: News24 | Trump objects Republican plan to make him the party's presumptive presidential nominee
item.description: A resolution presented to the Republican National Committee to declare Donald Trump the party's presumptive presidential nominee was abruptly withdrawn hours later after objections from Trump.

item.title: News24 | SA vs Israel: ICJ to decide whether there is a 'prima facie' case of genocide in Gaza
item.description: By Friday afternoon, the International Court of Justice will have decided whether South Africa has made a prima facie genocide case against Israel over its military operation in Gaza - and decide whether there is a basis to order an immediate ceasefire.

item.title: News24 | Israel offers 'curated' secret documents to show SA's genocide claims are wrong - report
item.description: Israel will provide the International Court of Justice (ICJ) some, but not all, of the orders issued to its military as it invaded Gaza, the New York Times reports.

item.title: News24 | Biden wobbles under weight of multiple open fronts around the world
item.description: Long gone is the Joe Biden of February 2023, strolling confidently through the streets of Kyiv, basking in the role as champion of the Ukrainian cause in the fight against Vladimir Putin's Russia.

item.title: News24 | Sarah Ferguson 'in good spirits' as she opens up about skin cancer diagnosis
item.description: Sarah Ferguson has shared health updates after the announcement of her skin cancer diagnosis.
